category: Regulations on the establishment and operation of the Advisory Committee/Article 25 (Athlete Relations Committee)
contents: Article 25 (Athletes' Relations Committee) The Athlete's Relations Committee responds to the president's advice on the following matters. 1. Matters related to athletes, such as health management, career development, and ethical issues (doping, illegal gambling, match-fixing, (sexual) assault, etc.) 2. Matters related to athletesâ€™ contracts or employment conditions, profit generation, commercial relationships, media response, etc. 3. Matters related to education for athletes and athlete officials through appropriate standards and guidelines 4. Other matters recognized as being in line with the functions of the Athlete Relations Committee and submitted by the president [This article was newly established on July 5, 2023]
